title: Timekeeping Manager
description: A swing-based stand-alone application designed to manage timekeeping for a small business, written in Java. In development.

title: Minecraft Dungeon Instance Manager
description: A basic server-side CraftBukkit plugin for Minecraft that is designed to manage instance-based dungeons for multiplayer roleplaying. Written in Java.

title: OpenProcessing Portfolio
description: A collection of older, fun applets I made using the Processing development environment. Written in the Processing flavor of Java.
